Action Items:

  • Collect feedback from employees who have undergone the new training programs and participated in the feedback and recognition framework. Analyze the feedback to identify areas of success and areas for improvement.
  • Conduct follow-up interviews with key employees and leaders to assess changes in the company culture and leadership dynamics. Compare results to the initial observations to measure the impact of implemented programs.
  • Review engagement survey results and use the data to make informed decisions on further adjustments to the leadership framework. Identify trends and areas that require additional focus.
  • Iterate on the leadership training program based on feedback and performance data. Update the program materials and delivery methods to enhance effectiveness continually.

Collateral: Feedback reports, follow-up interview summaries, revised leadership training program materials, updated engagement survey.
